response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $800,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your operations and contribute to your growth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
